title: ‘Is This a Joke?’ Arenberg Chicane Debate Divides Peloton ahead of Paris-Roubaix Mayhem
content:
'Leave as it is, or delete the race': Opinions collide over improvised U-turn just meters ahead of the gates of the 'Hell of the North.'

Read the full article at ‘Is This a Joke?’ Arenberg Chicane Debate Divides Peloton ahead of Paris-Roubaix Mayhem on Velo.
author: ahood
